TopicTitle: Crash occurs after adding mods; same crash continues to occur after removing the mods which caused the crash to start occurring

Articles.Content:
I'm attempting to build a modded install piece by piece, since trying to add a lot of mods at once causes problems that I absolutely cannot troubleshoot even though they should theoretically all work fine.

Most recently added were Restock & Restock+, and Tundra Exploration. Subsequently, the game experiences a fatal error during loading that crashes the game on startup, due to "no tank type named 'ox' exists". The error continues to occur after removing the mods that I installed since the most recent successful loading of the game. How can I determine what's even causing the problem so that I can fix it?

I can't post the log because it's far too big for Pastebin, so if anyone has an alternative solution to posting it then please let me know.
Try a different sharing site- Dropbox and Google Docs are often used for posting logs.
